entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
